micronaut-rethrow-root 1.0.1

com.agorapulse.micronaut.rethrow

Annotation Type Rethrow


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
 @Around
 @Type(value=RethrowInterceptor.class)
public @interface Rethrow
    Rethrows an exception as different one. You should set the value or the as property otherwise RuntimeException used as wrapper function. If value is set then as is ignored.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Class<? extends RuntimeException> as 
      String message 
      Class<? extends Throwable>[] only 
      Class<? extends Function<? extends Throwable,? extends RuntimeException>> value 

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract Class<? extends Function<? extends Throwable,? extends RuntimeException>> value
        Returns:
        Function or closure which coverts the thrown exception to new one. New exception must extend RuntimeException
        Default:
        com.agorapulse.micronaut.rethrow.RethrowAsRuntimeException.class

      • as

        public abstract Class<? extends RuntimeException> as
        Returns:
        Type of the RuntimeException wrapping the original cause. The exception class must have constructor which accepts Throwable
        Default:
        java.lang.RuntimeException.class

      • only

        public abstract Class<? extends Throwable>[] only
        Returns:
        only handle exceptions assignable to given type
        Default:
        java.lang.Throwable.class

      • message

        public abstract String message
        Returns:
        Additional message for the rethrown RuntimeException. The exception class must have constructor accepting two arguments (String and Throwable
        Default:
        ""
